articles.title: James Webb Space Telescope given revised 24 December launch - RNZ
articles.description: US and European officials have confirmed a Christmas Eve launch for the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST).
articles.content:
By Jonathan Amos for the BBC
US and European officials have confirmed a Christmas Eve launch for the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST).

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: London declares COVID-19 a major incident and Netherlands locks down for Christmas as tighter measures return across Europe - ABC News
articles.description: The Netherlands bans Christmas gatherings, Paris cancels its New Year's Eve fireworks, and London declares COVID-19 a major incident as Europe battles the "lightning" spread of the Omicron variant.
articles.content:
Nations across Europe have moved to reimpose tougher measures to stem a new wave of COVID-19 infections spurred by the highly transmissible Omicron variant.

articles.title: NASA to launch Webb Space Telescope next Friday - CGTN
articles.description: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson confirmed Friday to launch the James Webb Space Telescope on December 24 by a European Ariane rocket from South America's French Guiana.
articles.content:
NASA is shooting for next Friday Christmas Eve to launch its newest space telescope.
